title: Demacian Icon won't unlock
body:
Says please refresh and try again.
  -   Yes I've done that 
  -  [Yes region and language matches my region](http://i.imgur.com/JDnDivb.jpg)

replies.body: There may be a platform issue with the Universe website for Oceania. I'll get on this ASAP! Thanks for the report, and sorry for the late reply.
Great but how can I get my icon? with only 6 days left to acquire it, will it fixed by then? I dont want to miss out on the icon!
Hopefully it's fixed! Can you try now?
Contact Player Support and they'll be able to put you on the distribution list!
i  unclock my new icon but i can`t find it
